Name: Their Radiance
About the game: Their Radiance is an unconventional walking simulator about love. In this game, you can expect to find a tale of two individuals named Rose and Maxwell who are trying to look for each other after separating after a long time. You have the ability to join them on their adventure as they make their way to each other through various environments.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Their Radiance? Check out the release date (Jun 7, 2020), developer insights from Konotoko, and a complete game summary.
